Battleship is a board game for two players who try to guess the location of the ships each player hides on a plastic grid that can't be seen by his opponent. Players take turns calling out a row and column on the other player's grid in an attempt to name a square that contains an opponent's ship. There are three difficulties in our awesome game!


Easy Mode - each player get a fleet of five ships. 
1.One Submarines of 3 tiles 
2.Two Battleships of 4 tiles 
3.Two Carriers of 5 tiles


Medium Mode - each player get a fleet of five ships. 
1.One Cruises of 2 tiles 
2.Two Submarines of 3 tiles 
3.Two Battleships of 4 tiles


Hard Mode - each player get a fleet of five ships. 
1.One Destroyer of 1 tiles 
2.Two Cruises of 2 tiles 
3.Two Submarines of 3 tiles


Good Luck and Enjoy the game sailor!
